title: Climate pledges depend too much on natural carbon sinks -report - Reuters.com
description: Current climate pledges focus too much on land-based carbon sinks such as tree planting rather than food production and biodiversity, researchers from Australia, Denmark, Sweden and elsewhere said in a report on Tuesday.
